product.description: The Allez Expert features a Smartweld frame with SL Hydroforming and full monocoque Tarmac carbon fork. You'll make easy work of the toughest climbs, steepest descents and stay with the fastest group rides with the Shimano Ultegra 11-speed drivetrain (and your impressive determination).

bullets.bullet: Race-inspired, smooth-welded, fully-manipulated E5 Premium Aluminium frame with Smartweld SL technology and tapered headtube is light and fast
Tarmac Comp full monocoque FACT carbon fork with tapered steerer is super light with great torsional rigidity for high-speed handling
Fulcrum Racing S Five wheels blend super lightweight performance with high durability to keep you rolling fast with Espoir Elite tyres
Shimano Ultegra shifters are at the ready for all your shifting needs and are super lightweight
Minimalist, high-performance Body Geometry Toupe Comp Gel saddle with Cr-Mo rails, flat profile, and generous padding for long rides and explosive efforts

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized E5 Premium Aluminium w/ Smartweld SL technology, hydroformed aluminium tubing, 1-3/8" lower bearing, OSBB
specs.fork: FORK Specialized Tarmac, FACT carbon full monocoque, carbon steerer/crown for 1-3/8" lower bearing
specs.headset: HEADSET 1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 8mm cone spacer, w/ 20mm of carbon spacers
specs.handlebars: HANDLEBARS Specialized Tarmac Expert, short drop
specs.tape: TAPE Specialized S-Wrap, w/ bar shapers
specs.crankset: CRANKSET FSA SL-K Light, carbon arms, 10-speed compact, alloy rings
specs.pedals: PEDALS Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
specs.front_wheel: FRONT WHEEL Fulcrum Racing S Five
specs.rear_wheel: REAR WHEEL Fulcrum Racing S Five
specs.front_tire: FRONT TYRE Specialized Espoir Elite, 60TPI, aramid bead, double BlackBelt protection, 700x25c
specs.rear_tire: REAR TYRE Specialized Espoir Elite, 60TPI, aramid bead, double BlackBelt protection, 700x25c
specs.saddle: SADDLE Body Geometry Toupe Comp Gel, hollow Cr-Mo rails, 143mm
specs.seatpost: SEATPOST Specialized Pro SL, FACT carbon, 27.2mm

product.description: The Allez Race name says it all—it's a bike begging to be ridden at top speed. Its E5 aluminium frame features Smartweld technology and full monocoque Tarmac carbon fork, and is partnered with a Shimano 105 drivetrain to make sure you're always riding as fast as possible.

bullets.bullet: Race-inspired, smooth-welded, fully-manipulated E5 Premium Aluminium frame with Smartweld technology and tapered headtube is light and fast
Tarmac Comp full monocoque FACT carbon fork with tapered steerer is super light with great torsional rigidity for high-speed handling
AXIS 2.0 wheels provide semi-aero performance with lightweight rims and strength to keep you rolling fast with Specialized Espoir tyres
Shimano 105 STI shift levers provide crisp shifting to ensure you're always in the right gear
Minimalist, high-performance Body Geometry Toupe Comp Gel saddle with Cr-Mo rails, flat profile, and generous padding for long rides and explosive efforts

product.description: The stiff, light, race-inspired Allez Comp offers great acceleration and handling—perfect for aspiring racers, or as a winter training bike for more accomplished veterans. With the 10-speed Shimano 105 group and upgraded wheels, this is a bike that's race-ready and itching to perform.

bullets.bullet: Double-butted, smooth-welded A1 Premium Aluminium frame offers quality, durability, and light weight while featuring our race proven geometry for precise handling
Specialized FACT carbon fork is ultra lightweight and provides precise steering through the tightest turns
AXIS 1.0 wheelset is significantly lighter than comparable-level wheelsets; these tough wheels roll smooth and fast
Shimano alloy crankset with mid-compact gearing is stiff and light for efficiency over any terrain
Tarmac Comp oversized aluminium bar provides stiff and light performance
Shimano 105 STI shift levers provide crisp shifting to ensure you're always in the right gear

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized A1 Premium Aluminium, fully-manipulated tubing w/ smooth welds, 1-1/8" lower bearing
specs.fork: FORK Specialized FACT carbon, aluminium steerer/crown, 1-1/8"
specs.headset: HEADSET 1-1/8" sealed Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 20mm alloy cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
specs.stem: STEM Specialized Elite-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt, 31.8mm clamp
specs.tape: TAPE Specialized S-Wrap, w/ bar shapers

specs.rear_tire: REAR TYRE Specialized Espoir Folding, 60TPI, aramid bead, double BlackBelt protection, 700x25c
specs.saddle: SADDLE Body Geometry Riva Road Gel, 143mm

product.description: The stiff, light, race-inspired Allez Elite offers great acceleration and handling—perfect for aspiring racers, or as a winter training bike for more accomplished veterans. Race-ready perforce comes built-in with the 10-speed Shimano Tiagra drivetrain and dependable wheelset.

bullets.bullet: Double-butted, smooth-welded A1 Premium Aluminium frame offers quality, durability, and light weight while featuring our race proven geometry for precise handling
Specialized FACT carbon fork is ultra lightweight and provides precise steering through the tightest turns
Tough, durable, three-cross AXIS Classic wheelset
FSA Tempo compact crankset, pairs perfectly with 10-speed Shimano Tiagra STI shifters for smooth and precise shifting

product.description: The stiff, light, race-inspired Allez Sport offers great acceleration and handling—perfect for an aspiring racer, or as a first road bike if you're just getting into the sport. 9-speed Shimano Sora and light, strong wheels for high-end performance at a serious value.

bullets.bullet: Double-butted, smooth-welded A1 Premium Aluminium frame offers quality, durability, and light weight while featuring our race proven geometry for precise handling
Specialized FACT carbon fork is ultra lightweight and provides precise steering through the tightest turns
Tough, durable, three-cross AXIS Classic wheelset
Never miss a critical shift with Shimano Sora STI shifters
Supportive Body Geometry Riva Road Gel saddle is the perfect combination of comfort and efficiency

product.description: The stiff, light, race-inspired Allez Sport offers great acceleration and handling—perfect for an aspiring racer, or as a first road bike if you're just getting into the sport. The 9-speed Shimano gearing and lighter wheels will improve your efficiency over any terrain.

bullets.bullet: Double-butted, smooth-welded A1 Premium Aluminium frame offers quality, durability, and light weight while featuring our race proven geometry for precise handling
Specialized A1 Premium Aluminium fork provides lightweight and predictable steering
Tarmac Comp oversized aluminium bar is stiff and light for serious performance and features Specialized S-Wrap bar tape for tacky grip and superior vibration damping
Never miss a critical shift with Shimano 2400 Claris STI shifters
Supportive Body Geometry Riva Road Gel saddle is the perfect combination of comfort and efficiency
